thread.title: W.J. Shannon

author: W.J. Shannon
title: W.J. Shannon
text:
Shaun expertly and easliy walked me through the Zip Recruiter web-site and sign-up process. His advice also helped me to customize this product into the most economical service for our company. Hopefully, positive add performance results will oblige us to continue using Zip Recruiter as a valued resource. It would be my pleasure to work with Shaun again.
W.J. Shannon
Controller; Kids Experience Preschool
